name: biomni-get-captured-plots
title: Biomni: Get Captured Plots
description: Get all captured matplotlib plots from previous Python REPL executions. Returns a list of base64-encoded plot images.
content:
Overview

This utility tool retrieves all matplotlib plots that have been captured during previous Python REPL executions in the persistent session. Plots are returned as base64-encoded image data, enabling programmatic access to generated visualizations.

Input Parameters

  • None required - accepts empty JSON object ({})

Biological Use Case

During exploratory bioinformatics analysis, researchers often generate multiple plots for quality control, data exploration, and results visualization. This tool allows programmatic retrieval of all captured plots for:

  • Batch export of QC plots from sequencing data analysis
  • Collecting visualization series from iterative parameter testing
  • Automated report generation with embedded analysis plots
  • Archiving plots from multi-step genomic data processing pipelines
  • Extracting figures for manuscripts or presentations

Output

Generates a parameters (captured_plots.json) containing an array of base64-encoded plot images. Each plot can be decoded and saved as PNG or displayed in reports and dashboards.

Category
